name: trpg-realm
description: A rugged online board for trpg

scripts.watch: chokidar src/realm.js -c "yarn run build:js" & postcss --watch src/tailwind.css -o public/dist/tailwind.css
scripts.dev: mkdir -p public/dist && yarn run build:js && yarn run build:css && chokidar src/index.html -c "cp src/index.html public/index.html" & yarn run server & yarn run watch & yarn run static
